text: læa rea di hı mi lm phad kæ su lay man sung man ca phad pi nı yam chea pen wela hnung deuxn læa man ca phad klab nı yam yen pen wela hnung deuxn læa rea di hı hil ma kæ khea sung tana thxngheluxng (khux hı thxngheluxng thi hlxmtaw pen tana hil ma sahrab su lay man) nı hmu yin nan mi phu thangan xyu beuxnghna khea dwy xnumati hæng phracea khxng khea læa phu dı nı hmu phwk khea hanhe cak phra baycha khxng rea rea ca hı khea lim rs kar lngthosʹ thi mi fi luk chotichwng
